data.name: Edgar A Guevara
data.profession: Senior Java Development Engineer | Technical leader Web Development
data.Profile:
I am a software engineer with 7+ year experience in software development, in multiples projects and solutions like enterprise portals for banking and telecommunications Companies. 

 I am currently serving as a technical leader and senior development in following technologies: 
 Liferay DXP v7.2, Angular 7, Sass, Bootstrap 3, Clarity, NPM, Maven, JAVA 12, REST-API with JWT and GIT.
 About me, I could say I am passionate about all technology's world, and also could describe myself as a very hard-working, self-critical, self-taught, and proactive person, always I want to be the better me, so that I use all my skills to prepare to create a better world through the last technologies.

experience.jobDescription: As a Senior Software Development Engineer to one Local bank which is a client of Consultec-TI  where I am responsible development of new features to an integral business solution based on AWS cloud microservices

As a Senior Technical / Developer leader, my role was based on: 
 Provide technical support for the creation of functionalities definitions within an omnichannel banking solution, specifically in the WEB channel that is based on Liferay DXP v7.2. 
 Technically support and guidance to the development team following good programming practices as the latest standards in the market. 
 Study together with the team of technical leaders the new tools on the market, as well as determine the different mechanisms to make the application faster, fully functional, and sustainable over time. 
 Maintain and support the different implementations of the solution, keeping that the structure of the main product. 
 Manage, together with the infrastructure team, all the necessary components for the generation of the project's CI / CD.

Worked as Senior Software Developer and team leader to one Local bank, where I had the responsibility of leadership the development of new features to an integral business solution based Liferay DXP7.0 
 And Java 1.8., APIs RESTfull, Gradle, AngularJS, Bootstrap 3, HTML5, GIT. 
 Then I helped team up with all the necessary information to maintain the entire solution, and I had to create a work pattern within an agile team and create all the supporting documentation for future developers.

Worked with the following technologies:
 j2EE, Spring, Struts, PrimeFaces and Hibernate ORM.
 I helped with the maintenance of systems developed with WEB technologies by many different clients of the Company .

Worked with PHP 4 and 5, JavaScript with JQUERY, for templates used HTML5 and CCS3 with Bootstrap, then I helped with maintenance of systems developed with those technologies. 
 I leadership the change of technology department that included using PHP 5.4 with framework PhalconPHP and using GIT to manage version of source code, including GitLab.
